title: Picturesque Tasmania
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept of Commerce. Cinema Branch, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Social life and customs
abstract: A short panorama of Tasmania including Burnie and Hobart as they were in 1933.
description: Produced by the Cinema Branch, Australian Department of Commerce. A driving tour of Tasmania from Hobart along the western, northern, eastern and southern coasts focussing on the natural scenery. A number of towns and their various industries can also be seen such as trout hatcheries, the Mt Lyell mine, hops and apple growing. Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002943; A Tasmanian Time Capsule; Active; 2014
